1.description: Continues his complex relationship with Tuon while planning their eventual separation and her return to the Seanchan.

10.description: His feelings for Tuon deepen despite knowing she must return to her people. Shows increasing protectiveness.

36.description: Participates in the marriage ceremony with Tuon, formally becoming Prince of the Ravens through Seanchan ritual.

1.description: Continues to learn about Mat while maintaining her imperial dignity. Shows growing respect for his abilities.

10.description: Develops genuine feelings for Mat while preparing to return to her duties as heir to the Crystal Throne.

36.description: Completes the marriage ceremony with Mat, becoming Fortuona and making him her Prince of the Ravens.

2.description: Finalizes plans to rescue Faile with Seanchan help. Prepared to do anything necessary to save his wife.

26.description: Successfully rescues Faile from the Shaido with Seanchan assistance, finally reuniting with his beloved wife.

2.description: Endures continued captivity among the Shaido while plotting and planning for any opportunity to escape.

26.description: Finally rescued by Perrin and reunited with her husband after enduring long captivity among the Shaido.

7.description: Continues her campaign for the Lion Throne while dealing with her advancing pregnancy and political opposition.

21.description: Successfully secures enough support to claim the Lion Throne of Andor, becoming the rightful Queen.

22.description: Captured by the White Tower during a planned infiltration. Now held prisoner in the Tower she once hoped to heal.

24.description: Maintains her dignity and authority even while imprisoned, planning to reunite the Tower from within.

rand-althor.name: Rand al'Thor
aliases: He Who Comes With the Dawn

18.description: Continues to harden emotionally while dealing with increasing pressures. His relationships suffer as he becomes more distant.

21.description: Meets with Semirhage, one of the Forsaken, in a fateful encounter that will have lasting consequences.
A Forsaken posing as an advisor, finally revealed in her true nature during a crucial meeting with Rand.

23.description: Captured after her revelation but remains extremely dangerous even while imprisoned.

7.description: Continues as Elayne's Warder, providing protection and support during the crucial period of securing the throne.

21.description: Celebrates Elayne's success in claiming the Lion Throne while maintaining her role as protector and friend.

1.description: Continues to travel with Mat's group, providing wisdom and counsel during the complex situation with Tuon.

36.description: Witnesses and supports Mat's marriage to Tuon, understanding the significance of this union for the future.

1.description: Continues her devoted service to Tuon while adapting to their unusual circumstances with Mat's group.

36.description: Serves as witness to Tuon's marriage ceremony, maintaining her role as the new Empress's most trusted attendant.

1.description: Continues traveling with Mat's group, showing increasing maturity and understanding of adult complexities.

36.description: Witnesses the marriage ceremony and understands its importance, showing wisdom beyond his years.

2.description: Leads the Shaido while facing increasing pressure from external forces and internal dissent.

26.description: Faces defeat and capture as her Shaido are overwhelmed by the combined forces arrayed against them.

2.description: A powerful Shaido Wise One who continues to support Sevanna while managing internal Shaido politics.

26.description: Faces the consequences of the Shaido defeat alongside the other Wise Ones and clan leaders.

2.description: Continues her humiliating captivity among the Shaido while secretly plotting her escape and revenge.

26.description: Her fate becomes uncertain as the Shaido are defeated and scattered, possibly gaining freedom or facing new captivity.

2.description: Coordinates with Perrin's forces in planning the joint assault on the Shaido to rescue the captives.

26.description: Successfully leads the Seanchan forces in the joint victory over the Shaido, fulfilling her part of the bargain.

2.description: Maintains her dignity and hope while continuing as a prisoner of the Shaido alongside Faile.

26.description: Rescued alongside Faile and the others, finally free to return to ruling Ghealdan properly.

2.description: Continues to protect and care for Faile despite being her captor, showing increasing conflict about his role.

26.description: His fate is sealed during the rescue operation as he faces the consequences of the Shaido's actions.

18.description: Continues her attempts to influence and guide Rand, believing her harsh methods are necessary for his success.

21.description: Present during the encounter with Semirhage, dealing with the aftermath of the Forsaken's revelation.

18.description: Continues to stay close to Rand, providing emotional support while worrying about his increasing coldness.

21.description: Witnesses the encounter with Semirhage and its consequences, understanding the gravity of the situation.

18.description: Present with Rand's group, using her healing abilities and providing counsel when possible.

21.description: Plays a crucial role during and after the Semirhage encounter, using her healing skills as needed.

20.description: Present with Nynaeve and involved in the events surrounding Rand's confrontation with the Forsaken.

21.description: Provides security and support during the dangerous encounter with Semirhage and its aftermath.

18.description: Continues to serve Rand with her powerful channeling abilities while adapting to her freedom from Seanchan control.

21.description: Her strength in the Power proves crucial during the confrontation with Semirhage, helping to contain the threat.

18.description: Continues her Wise One training while maintaining her relationship with Rand despite his growing emotional distance.

20.description: Struggles with Rand's increasing coldness while fulfilling her duties as both a Wise One and one of his loves.

19.description: His strength in saidin continues to return, making him increasingly important among those who can channel.

23.description: Plays a role in dealing with the aftermath of the Semirhage encounter, using his recovered abilities.

2.description: Coordinates military strategy for the rescue of his daughter Faile, working with Perrin and the Seanchan allies.

26.description: Celebrates the successful rescue of his daughter and the defeat of the Shaido threat to the region.

2.description: Continues to support Perrin's rescue mission while managing her own political interests and the Mayene forces.

26.description: Participates in the victory celebration while maintaining her political acumen and relationship with allies.

2.description: Provides Aes Sedai support to the rescue mission while serving as Berelain's advisor and representative.

26.description: Uses her One Power abilities during the final assault on the Shaido, contributing to the successful rescue.

2.description: Continues his fanatical preaching while his followers cause chaos and destruction in the Dragon's name.

12.description: His influence begins to wane as other priorities and conflicts take precedence in the region.

2.description: Leads Ghealdan forces in the joint mission to rescue Queen Alliandre from Shaido captivity.

26.description: Successfully participates in the rescue of his Queen, restoring her to freedom and proper rule.

2.description: Commands the Winged Guards of Mayene in support of the rescue mission, coordinating with allied forces.

26.description: Leads his troops effectively in the final battle against the Shaido, contributing to the overall victory.

2.description: Continues to gather intelligence and provide strategic information for the rescue operation.

27.description: His information-gathering skills prove valuable in the aftermath of the successful rescue mission.

22.description: Maintains her position as Tower Amyrlin while dealing with Egwene's capture and the ongoing division in the Tower.

24.description: Struggles to maintain control as Egwene's presence in the Tower creates new political complications.

22.description: Reacts to Egwene's capture with concern and determination to continue the rebel cause despite this setback.

23.description: Works to maintain rebel unity and plan for Egwene's eventual return or rescue from Tower captivity.

22.description: Uses Egwene's capture as an opportunity to increase her own influence within the rebel Hall.

23.description: Competes for leadership of the rebels while Egwene remains captive in the White Tower.

22.description: Also sees Egwene's capture as a chance to advance her position and influence among the rebel Aes Sedai.

23.description: Rivals Romanda for control of the rebel faction while their true Amyrlin remains imprisoned.

14.description: Continues to struggle with divided loyalties between his sister's cause and his feelings for Egwene.

24.description: Reacts strongly to news of Egwene's capture, torn between duty and his desire to help the woman he loves.

14.description: Remains in hiding while watching her daughter's campaign for the throne she once held.

21.description: Witnesses her daughter's success in claiming the Lion Throne, seeing the crown properly restored to their family.

14.description: A noble who previously claimed the throne but now faces the reality of Elayne's stronger position.

recaps.1: Mat continues his complex relationship with Tuon while planning their separation. Suroth searches for the missing Daughter of the Nine Moons.
recaps.2: Perrin finalizes plans for rescuing Faile with Seanchan help. Sevanna faces increasing pressure from multiple threats to the Shaido.
recaps.3: The prisoners among the Shaido, including Faile and Alliandre, continue to endure captivity while maintaining hope for rescue.
recaps.4: Internal Shaido politics create tensions while the prisoners adapt to their circumstances. Sevanna struggles with leadership challenges.
recaps.5: Military preparations intensify as Perrin, Bashere, and their allies coordinate with Seanchan forces for the upcoming rescue operation.
recaps.6: Mat and Tuon's relationship deepens as they spend more time together, despite knowing their situation must eventually change.
recaps.7: Elayne advances her campaign for the Lion Throne while dealing with her pregnancy and various political opponents in Andor.
recaps.8: The complex dynamics of Mat's group continue to evolve while Perrin's rescue preparations reach advanced stages.
recaps.9: Mat finds himself increasingly drawn to Tuon as their relationship becomes more genuine and complex on both sides.
recaps.10: Perrin considers desperate measures for Faile's rescue while Mat's feelings for Tuon grow despite their opposing circumstances.
recaps.11: Mat and Tuon's bond strengthens while Elayne faces crucial decisions in her campaign to secure the Lion Throne of Andor.
recaps.12: The rescue operation against the Shaido moves into its final planning stages while Masema's influence begins to wane in the region.
recaps.13: Elayne's succession campaign intensifies as she works to secure the support of key noble houses in her rightful claim.
recaps.14: The Andoran succession becomes more complex as various nobles position themselves while Elayne builds crucial support.
recaps.15: Political maneuvering reaches critical stages in Andor as Elayne's pregnancy adds complications to her royal campaign.
recaps.16: Multiple storylines advance as political situations develop toward resolution in both Andor and the rescue operation.
recaps.17: Elayne continues building support for her throne claim while various allies work toward their respective goals.
recaps.18: Rand's emotional distance grows while Elayne makes progress in her succession and other characters face their own challenges.
recaps.19: Various political and personal situations reach important developments as characters work toward their objectives.
recaps.20: Critical moments approach in multiple storylines as Elayne's campaign and other situations near resolution points.
recaps.21: Elayne successfully secures the Lion Throne while Rand faces a dangerous encounter with Semirhage, one of the Forsaken.
recaps.22: Egwene is captured during a planned infiltration of the White Tower, creating new complications for the rebel Aes Sedai.
recaps.23: The aftermath of both Egwene's capture and Rand's encounter with Semirhage creates new challenges for their respective allies.
recaps.24: Political situations shift as Egwene's presence in the Tower creates complications while other characters deal with recent developments.
recaps.25: The final preparations for the Shaido rescue operation are completed as all allied forces prepare for the decisive assault.
recaps.26: The rescue operation succeeds brilliantly, with Faile, Alliandre, and other prisoners freed while the Shaido are defeated.
recaps.27: Celebrations and aftermath of the successful rescue mission, with characters reuniting and planning their next steps.
recaps.28: Mat and Tuon's relationship reaches new levels of understanding as their time together continues to deepen their bond.
recaps.29: The search for Tuon intensifies among Seanchan forces while Mat and Tuon face decisions about their future together.
recaps.30: Mat and Tuon prepare for the formal conclusion of their relationship as both face their respective duties and desires.
recaps.31: Seanchan politics become more complex as various factions deal with the missing Daughter of the Nine Moons situation.
recaps.32: Mat and Tuon approach the moment when they must part ways, despite their growing feelings for each other.
recaps.33: Preparations for the formal separation ceremony begin, though both Mat and Tuon struggle with their genuine emotions.
recaps.34: The relationship between Mat and Tuon reaches its climax as they prepare for the ceremony that will define their future.
recaps.35: Final political resolutions occur in Andor while other characters prepare for the significant events about to unfold.
recaps.36: The marriage ceremony between Mat and Tuon takes place, formally making him Prince of the Ravens in Seanchan tradition.
recaps.37: Consequences of the marriage unfold as various characters react to this significant union and its implications for the future.
